title: Can I give zakat al fitr early 2 someone who is needy Or 2 someone in another country assim alhakeem
transcript: now if I see somebody Ramadan who is always no you cannot give someone who's in need at the moment you're the cattle footer because as you've clearly stated it is only permissible to give zakatal footer one or two days before the end of Ramadan one or two days according to what Abdullah may Allah be pleased with him and with his father said so more than that is not permissible according to the most authentic opinion of Scholars however now if I send my money to a brother in Yemen or in Syria and say to them this is my zakata only give it on the 29th or the 30th of Ramadan this is valid because I trust that they will not give it to the poor until it's due time and this is permissible just
